column6:
A top-floor suite of a modern and colorful two-story house that includes a delightful library, jacuzzi, a bathroom with two sinks and a peaceful master bedroom. 
-2 miles from the crown jewel of Austin, cool and delicious Barton Springs Pool! 
-5 minutes by car from kick-ass music spots and restaurants.
-Legendary Broken Spoke dance hall is 6 minutes away. 
-Walk to Radio, one of Austin's best bar/coffee/music/food venues. 
-Plus a full kitchen and a host who loves you.
- Can sleep 4
column9: Light & Joy in the Heart of Austin!
